mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) value FROM hm_crm_client_info info LEFT JOIN hm_crm_source source ON info.SOURCEID = source.ID AND source.COMPANYID = 1 WHERE info.COMPANYID = 1 AND info.ISDEL = 0 AND source.TYPEID IN(1,2) AND info.STATUSID != 0 AND info.STATUSID != 99 AND info.STATUSID != 98 AND info.CREATETIME BETWEEN UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(CURDATE(),' 00:00:00')) AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(CURDATE(),' 23:59:59') )

SELECT COUNT(1) value FROM hm_crm_client_info info LEFT JOIN hm_crm_source source ON info.SOURCEID = source.ID AND source.COMPANYID = 1 WHERE info.COMPANYID = 1 AND info.ISDEL = 0 AND source.TYPEID IN(1,2) AND info.STATUSID != 0 AND info.STATUSID != 99 AND info.STATUSID != 98 AND info.CREATETIME BETWEEN UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(LEFT(CURDATE(),7),'-01 00:00:00')) AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(LAST_DAY(CURDATE()),' 23:59:59'))

SELECT COUNT(1) value FROM hm_crm_client_info info LEFT JOIN hm_crm_source source ON info.SOURCEID = source.ID AND source.COMPANYID = 1 WHERE info.COMPANYID = 1 AND info.ISDEL = 0 AND source.TYPEID IN(1,2) AND info.STATUSID != 0 AND info.STATUSID != 99 AND info.STATUSID != 98 AND (info.STATUSID = 1 OR info.STATUSID = 12 OR info.STATUSID = 6) AND info.CREATETIME BETWEEN UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(CURDATE(),' 00:00:00')) AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(CURDATE(),' 23:59:59'))

SELECT COUNT(1) value FROM hm_pub_group grp LEFT JOIN hm_pub_group_staff rela ON grp.GROUPID = rela.GROUPID AND rela.COMPANYID = 1 LEFT JOIN hm_pub_staff sf ON rela.STAFFID = sf.ID AND sf.COMPANYID = 1 WHERE grp.COMPANYID = 1 AND grp.GROUPTYPE = 'dsyy' AND sf.ISDEL = 0 AND sf.ISLOCK = 0 AND sf.STATUSFLAG = 1

SELECT grp.GROUPNAME name, COUNT(1) total FROM hm_crm_client_info info LEFT JOIN hm_crm_source src ON info.SOURCEID = src.ID AND info.COMPANYID = src.COMPANYID LEFT JOIN hm_pub_group_staff rela ON info.APPOINTORID = rela.STAFFID AND info.COMPANYID = rela.COMPANYID LEFT JOIN hm_pub_group grp ON rela.GROUPID = grp.GROUPID AND rela.COMPANYID = grp.COMPANYID WHERE info.COMPANYID = 1 AND info.ISDEL = 0 AND src.TYPEID IN(1,2) AND info.CREATETIME BETWEEN UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(CURDATE(),' 00:00:00')) AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CONCAT(CURDATE(),' 23:59:59')) AND grp.GROUPTYPE = 'dsyy' GROUP BY grp.GROUPID ORDER BY grp.PRIORITY ASC
